fields.name: BAME Labour
fields.description: BAME Labour is the institution tasked with representing Labour's 'Black, Asian, and Minority Ethnic' (BAME) members.  Other proposals relating to the representation of BAME people in the Labour Party should be submitted under Track 2 (Representation of BAME and LGBT members).

fields.name: Young Labour
fields.description: Young Labour is the body which represents the party's younger members (defined as people aged under 27).

fields.name: Women's Conference
fields.description: Women's Conference is a special Conference for female delegates representing women members of the party.  It was historically used by women to pass their own policy and submit it to annual Conference.

fields.name: CLP Governance
fields.description: The Governance of CLPs including the composition of CLP Executives and the training of CLP officers and members.

fields.name: Membership Involvement and Participation
fields.description: Strengthening the involvement and participation of our hundreds of thousands of new members in constituency parties and other aspects of the Party’s work.  This is a broad theme covering all reforms that enhance the involvement and participation of members which are not dealt with under other themes.

fields.name: Disability Labour and LGBT Labour
fields.description: Disability Labour represents people with disabililties in the Labour Party and LGBT Labour represents members who self-identify as Lesbian, Gay, Bisexual or Transgender (LGBT).

fields.name: Recruitment of Members
fields.description: All reforms and ideas to enhance the recruitment of new party members.

fields.name: Gender Representation
fields.description: Greater participation of women in CLPs and at other levels of the Party, gender representation throughout the Party, and the role of Labour women’s conference.

fields.name: Representation of BAME and LGBT members, and members with a disabililty
fields.description: Improving diversity at all levels within the Party including looking at how to increase the involvement of BAME members, LGBT members, members with a disability and other groups.

fields.name: Social Media
fields.description: Harnessing the potential of social media across all aspects of Labour’s democracy and political work.

fields.name: Local Government
fields.description: Developing the relationship between Labour’s local authority representatives and local parties.

fields.name: Leadership Elections
fields.description: The method of electing the Party Leader, including the role of registered supporters and the issue of nominating thresholds.

fields.name: Freeze Dates
fields.description: How freeze dates are applied in selections and Conferences.

fields.name: NEC Composition
fields.description: The composition of the NEC and the procedures for elections to it in its various elements.

fields.name: Trade Union Link
fields.description: Strengthening the links between the Party and its trade union affiliates locally and nationally, and engaging more of their members in the Party’s life.

fields.name: Regional Structures
fields.description: The role, accountability and transparency of regional structures.
